aliceyoung.name: Alice Young
aliceyoung.desc: I whip stylesheets into shape. Transferred to NU 2 years ago from a silly southern art school. Was on the organizing team for HackBeanpot 2014.

mollywhite.name: Molly White
mollywhite.desc: I do free and open-source software. I do a lot of work with Wikimedia and MediaWiki, and I write Twitter bots sometimes.

ryanplessner.name: Ryan Plessner
ryanplessner.desc: I do whatever needs doing. When I'm not brewing beer or performing surgery, I hack on my game engine side projects or some website or other.

mncoppola.name: Michael Coppola
mncoppola.desc: I like breaking code and hacking in the security sense. The lower level, the better.
